title: Game keeps crashing
body: I play on Mac Desktop and I just had a game where my client crashed twice. I’m not sure if it’s bug related or not. I’ve been was project vayne. Now I’m on leaver buster for crashing I’m really unhappy right now.

replies.body:
Be sure to take some time to do some general troubleshooting to make sure this doesn't happen again! There's a decent chance some game files might not be working properly so make sure you try a quick repair through the client options first. 

Test it in a custom game, and check out the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#section-mac) if the repair doesn't seem to help!
